name: Cálice
description:
A game about the military dictatorship in Brazil. In 1968, play as a student protesting against fascist and state propaganda. Rip posters of the walls, subvert pro-regime tags and try to stay away from the military police.

Game made for

Out of the frame!

A MAZE 2018

--- Controls ---

"W, A, S, D" to move

"Right Click" Zoom

"Left Click" to tip posters of the walls

"E" to equip spray can

"Left Click" with the spray can to subvert tags

--- Credits---

A Game by Rodrigo Dorta Marques

Freesounds from zapsplat.com and freesound.org/
